sentence.Network_en: He started the magazine with a schoolmate.

experiences at you college life , some many schoolmates all reflected this kind of question : not know oneself one day needs to make any , perhaps makes anything not vigorously .在你们经历的大学生活中，有许多同学都反映到了这样一个问题：不知道自己一天到底要做什么，或是做什么都不起劲。

entry.tran: (尤指关系要好的)同学，同窗，校友
entry.def: A schoolmate is a child who goes to the same school as you, especially one who is your friend.

example.ex: He started the magazine with a schoolmate...
example.tran: 他和一个同学创办了那份杂志。

example.ex: He was a favorite with his schoolmasters but not his schoolmates.
example.tran: 学校的老师们很喜欢他，但同学们对他并不待见。

means.word_mean: 1. an acquaintance that you go to school with

Sentence.sentence: Researchers in one study in Tokyo found that more than half of junior high school students used their phones to exchange e-mails with schoolmates more than 10 times a day.
